channel.title: starnix on wiki
channel.description: Recent content in starnix on wiki

item.title: fuchsia starnix
item.description: Starnix is the code name of a Fuchsia project which proposes to run unmodified Linux programs. This is my take to understand what is needed to do in order for Fuchsia to run Linux programs, and how Linux run programs itself. The main reference is RFC 0082 from Fuchsia, from which you definitely will benefit more. A Tale of Two Alternatives So, you want to run unmodified Linux programs in Fuchsia.
